content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'masterdata_accountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [masterdata_accountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://masterdata@accountdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[puesto_trabjo] (
	[job_position_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[fk_departament_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[job_position_name] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'job_position/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [masterdata_accountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[puesto_trabjo]
GO
